resources.string: We are first artisan espressobar in Groningen. We serve Insanely good coffee from all over the world roasted by the best roasters in Europe.
Oude Kijk in ‘t Jatstraat 32\n9712 EK Groningen\nNetherlands

Opening Times:
Mon – Fri: 8:30 am – 6:00 pm
Sat: 9:00 am – 6:00 pm
Sun: 11.00 am – 5.00 pm
